body.p:
Louisville Aug. 6. 1864
Gov. T. E. Bramlette
Dr Sir

A. B. Vallandingham who has done some service to the government desires the privilege of raising a battallion of the troops to be raised to fight guerillas. He is well acquainted with the geography of our state and could render good service in the premises. We respectfully recommend him to you.

Respectfully
M Mundy
Jno. W. Shelby
J. B. English
Jas,, H,, McDaniel
Geo. C. Drane

Hd. Qrs. Ky. St. Grd.
Lousiville. Aug 6, 1864
Monday Mark & others.

To the Gov and by him referred. Introducing A. B. Vallandingham, who desires to raise a Bat. of the troops to be raised to fight guerillas. States that, Mr A. is well acquainted with the Geography of the State. has seen and will do good service. Encloses a letter from Mr A. asking authority to raise troops for the purposes above mentioned.

Ans. Aug. 12th 1864 on.
